name: Roll the Teen Adventure
description:
Roll the Teen Adventure - cool arcade game with cartoon teen heroes rolling and jumping from fruit to fruit.
Make funny teen heads roll, jump and fly over the sunny beach or windy city!
Endless jumping adventure - tap the screen to jump and land on next rotating orange.
Collect coins and go to shop to unlock next hero characters!
Compete with your friends and compete with players all over the world!
If you are real master, unlock all eight titan friends!
